ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have sent you bearing witness, bringing good news and giving warning
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have sent you as witness (of the truth) and harbinger of good news and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), We have sent you forth as a witness, as a bearer of good news, and as a warner
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have sent you as a witness, a bearer of glad news, and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We have indeed sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a present witness and a Herald of glad tidings and warnings. (The Holy Prophet is a witness from Allah.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have sent you as a witness, as a bearer of glad tidings, and as a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have sent you as a witness and as a bearer of good news and as a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We have sent thee as a witness, good tidings to bear, and warning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We have sent thee (O Muhammad) as a witness and a bearer of good tidings and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have sent you forth as a witness and a bearer of good tidings and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We have sent thee as a witness and a bearer of glad tidings and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We have sent you as a witness, and as a bearer of good news and warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have truly sent thee as a witness, as a bringer of Glad Tidings, and as a Warner:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We have sent you (O Muhammad SAW) as a witness, as a bearer of glad tidings, and as a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have sent you (Prophet Muhammad) as a witness and as a bearer of glad tidings and warning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We sent you as a witness, and a bearer of good news, and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [48:8] Indeed We have sent you as a witness, against your community at the Resurrection, and a bearer of good tidings, to them in this world, and a warner, to threaten those in it who do evil with [the punishment of] the Fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We have sent thee) Muhammad (as a witness) over your community that you had delivered the message to them (and a bearer of good tidings) the Garden for the believers (and a warner) to the disbelievers from the Fire,
